name: wix-mcp-server
title: Wix MCP
summary: Unified access to Wix's development ecosystem for documentation, implementation, and site management.
description: The Wix MCP server provides a development assistant that unifies access to Wix's documentation, design system resources, and site management APIs. It enables developers to search docs, make authenticated API calls, manage sites programmatically, and receive contextual guidance for building Wix apps and integrations.

useCases.name: Documentation search
useCases.description: Search and retrieve relevant Wix API documentation and code samples.

useCases.name: Site management
useCases.description: Get contextual guidance for building Wix apps, headless implementations, and enterprise integrations, eliminating the need to switch between multiple resources.

oauth2.description: Supports OAuth flows for developer authentication and managed OAuth for onboarding.
